overview: From writer-director Kyran Kelly comes this darkly comedic computer animated short about a wiener dog that loses the affection of its owners because of the arrival of a real child. The twisted daschund knows there’s only room for one baby in the family and soon concocts a way to exterminate the competition so he can once have mom and dad’s love to himself. “Bundle of Joy” is a film about love, jealousy and of course, revenge.
tagline: “Bundle of Joy” is a film about love, jealousy and of course, revenge.
title: Bundle of Joy
